name: Weightless Tethers
description:
A CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED TO PLAY

Use your two tethers in space to guide yourself through levels.

Each arm is independently controlled by a joystick.

Controls:

Rb Lb : Rotate Player

Rt Lt : tether to wall

Left Stick Right Stick : point tethers

Press left or right Stick : Reel towards tether point

Originally created as a VR Project.
